Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Ah! <sp:5:1:0>I didn't think we'd see anybody
else down here!<sp:0:4:0>Though I imagine you could say the same
to us, huh?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Oh, hey, I thought we were the only ones
down he—<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Er,<sp:5:0:0> wait, no.<sp:5:0:0> I mean...
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Uhhh...<sp:5:0:0> You're here to investigate too,
right? <sp:5:0:0>Y'know, <sp:5:0:0>since you took the Yi—<sp:5:0:0> Er,
I mean, the survey-team interview?
Because we definitely took that interview
too. That's why we're here. Yep...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Oh, uh, take a look at this! <sp:5:1:0>Our latest
discovery nearly knocked us off our feet.

We found this weird device with these
wavering green letters on it, and this
<clr:0000>strange statue<clr:ffff>!
We think it's one of those living stone
<clr:0000>constructs<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Pretty sure it's supposed to
move too.
Well, I say that...<sp:5:0:0>but it's all just conjecture
on my part.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Truth is, we're in a bit of a panic here.
If we don't figure out how this thing works
soon, we're going to be in big trouble.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>This <clr:0000>strange statue<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> It's got to be a
<clr:0000>construct<clr:ffff>, no doubt about it.

I think it's supposed to move...<sp:5:0:0>but how
do we wake it up?
